title: Matchmaking Server IP Address
body:
Does anybody know the IP Addresses for the matchmaking server?

A few friends have been having lag/latency/packetloss/whatever problems recently so I was going to write them a small app in C# to show the ping of the server and the packet loss, but I can't seem to find the IP's for the various servers (EUW, OCE, NA etc).

I could use the website IP but it has an unstable latency and will differ to the actual matchmaking server latency.

replies.body: Nice coverup for you wanted to drop your way up the ladder.
If I wanted to do that I would just use the IP address of the matchmaking session assigned to the specific game.
